The accommodations were comfortable and well-maintained, providing a perfect retreat after our days out or just to relax and recover. The overall ambiance of the resort was tranquil and inviting, making it a perfect escape from the hustle and bustle. We are immensely grateful to the staff for their kindness and efficiency. Their professionalism and warmth truly made our stay unforgettable. We highly recommend Merusaka to anyone visiting Bali and looking for a stay that goes above and beyond in every aspect.
Beautiful place to stay, on the beach and close to markets. Food and service from all staff members 5 star üåü very comfortable bed and pillows. We have been twice now and will return.
Great hotel. Good position, good food... And u welcome me like and Angel at my arrival... At the check out, i was like a homeless. Not good at all.

Beautiful but large hotel on the shores of Nusa Dua beach with Private access. Very family friendly with a kids club where you can trust your toddlers with their day care team as well as two toddler friendly pools. Breakfast is extensive with many options to satisfy the culinary indecisive people. Great staff and venue. Located in a quiet part of Nusa Dua with lots of options of restaurants and activities

A fantastic 5 night stay at a beautiful location . Have stayed at Australian, Fijian and Phuket 5 star resorts previously but Merusaka is definitely my favourite and will come again And we did, 12 months but this time brought our whole family

Very nice hotel!! Super relaxing, great private beach area, very nice and accommodating staff, awesome breakfast, and huge nice territory of the hotel! Stayed for 9 nights with a friend, and loved it!! The room was huge, with an equally huge bathroom:) Overall absolutely loved our stay there, got to do a lot of relaxing and even a bit of surfing, as well as a bunch of nice light walking through the shoreline of Nusa dua to a very nice park area that also had awesome restaurants at the end of the peninsula. Most of the other hotel guests were families or couples (so if you want to party, that is not the best fit for you), and while at breakfast we saw a lot of people, the beach and the swimming pools looked pretty empty, as they are large and people can spread out - never had trouble finding a good spot with lounge chairs. The only disadvantage is that the seashore is pretty dirty, but it is not the hotel‚Äôs fault - that whole side of Nusa Dua is like this because of the currents and tides.

it‚Äôs a beautiful hotel. and awesome place for your vacation. they have a private beach and 4 restaurants. however it seems all the staff is new and less experienced when you compare to other big hotels in Bali. i‚Äôd definitely return back there some day.

I love the pools in this hotel, they have a couple of them, from a very shallow ones for you children and even one designed for you to do high jumps. Off course they also have a one that you can chill and enjoy the pool bar. Service is great, at par with other hotels in Nusa Dua. I don't think it's significantly better from other hotels. The ladies that tended the Child's club are great and very patient and friendly though. Food was okay, they have quite a good selection of foods during breakfast, but more towards local foods. I love the coffee (even though it comes out of a machine) and the variations of drinks the have (Jamu and Juices). Their traditional snack selection is also good. The rooms are spacious, the bathroom were almost as big as the room itself, providing you with a big tub and a large shower. The only thing that made me give them 4-stars is that the rooms have not been maintained very well. Rusts on the tub, AC that was dripping water and TVs that are still not smart TVs. on a good note they seemed to be fixing the hotel back to it's former glory again. Will look forward in staying here again and see what they have done to update the place.

Loved our 1st visit here... rooms are lovely.. needs a few more sun beds around the pool as often people keep them all day even when not wanted... staff are really friendly and helpful. Food is delicious and plentiful.

One of the best decision I ever made to stay in Nusa Dua, by choosing Merusaka for me and my family place to stay for 2 night. I booked the pool access room, the pool is so clean. The room itself is tidy, large and very nice bedroom. The hospitality of the staff is superb , the food itself, the breakfast and room service is delicious. The beach itself of courae very nice is Nusa Dua. I will recommend this place to everyone.

This was our second visit to Merusaka with our family. Our first visit was back in 2019, and at that time, it was still under its previous name. We booked the same room type, a deluxe room with pool access. The property has been very well-maintained; even after six years since our first visit, the rooms and hotel areas remain clean and in excellent condition. The check-in process was very quick, the hotel facilities were complete, the beach was beautiful, the pool was clean, and all the staff worked quickly and professionally. Thank you to the Merusaka team for such a memorable holiday. Our children truly enjoyed their time at Merusaka!
Perfect location in Nusa Dua. Facilities fantastic with multiple swimming pools and dining options. Food was first class definitely try the eye fillet steak OMG. Staff friendly and very welcoming.

It's THE place where you get to relax. Enjoy luxury and hospitallity, beach, great vegetarian(also jain) food ,amazing people , yoga , aerobics. Beach activities and the best location ....if i wanna travel bali again I would book here for sure ...I was really impressed with the staff and their approach towards their customer, their service...it was too good..loved the experience, worth the money ..

langsung akses ke pantai, buggy car nya terbatas. jadi hrs nunggu lama. lokasi tenang, dekat bali collection. petugas2 disini sangat perhatian, saat hujan lgsg kasih payung dan handuk untuk anak saya biar tidak kedinginan.

A Luxurious Stay at Merusaka Resort, Nusa Dua ‚Äì A True Balinese Gem We recently had the pleasure of staying at Merusaka Resort, Nusa Dua, in the stunning One Bedroom Pool Villa, and our experience was truly remarkable. Here's a breakdown of our stay: 1. Infrastructure (9/10) The resort is an architectural masterpiece, seamlessly blending traditional Balinese aesthetics with modern luxury. The One Bedroom Pool Villa was spotless, spacious, and equipped with an incredible private pool, a massive bathtub, and a beautifully designed bathroom. The air conditioning was perfect for Bali's tropical climate, and while the lighting was slightly dim, it added to the cozy ambiance. 2. Butler Service (11/10) The butler service was exceptional, available from 7 AM to 11 PM, and catered to our every need with remarkable professionalism. Whether it was arranging a buggy or fulfilling special requests, the butlers were always prompt and polite. A special shoutout to Maru, Suprapto, Anta and Adip, whose warmth and attentiveness made our stay even more enjoyable. Their efforts were beyond commendable. 3. Food (8/10) The dining options at the resort were diverse and satisfying. We dined at their Western, Indonesian, and Asian restaurants, and all offered delicious food paired with fantastic cocktails. The in-room dining menu, though limited, was sufficient for quick bites. However, we felt the absence of more Indian cuisine options, which could enhance the overall dining experience for Indian travelers like us. 4. Spa (10/10) The spa was one of the highlights of our stay. From the front desk to the therapists, everything was flawless. The treatments were incredibly relaxing and left us feeling rejuvenated. Truly one of the best spa experiences we've ever had! Just ensure booking in advance as they're mostly always booked! 5. Room for Improvement ‚Äì Front Desk (6/10) While most of the staff were exemplary, our check-in experience was disappointing. The staff member assisting us lacked professionalism and, at one point, made an inappropriate remark about our Indian accent. Such behavior is unacceptable, especially from the staff of a property as prestigious as Merusaka. We hope the management takes steps to ensure that all guests feel equally respected and welcomed. Overall Rating: 8.8/10 Merusaka Resort offers a near-perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and Balinese charm. The serene atmosphere, excellent villa amenities, world-class spa, and outstanding butler service far outweighed the minor setbacks. We would highly recommend Merusaka Resort to anyone looking for a peaceful and luxurious stay in Nusa Dua. With a few improvements in their front desk staff training, this property could easily become a flawless retreat. Thank you, Merusaka, for an unforgettable experience!

Poor check-in. Lack of guidance. Queued for over an hour in baking heat and told off for drinking some water we found in a conference room. The welcome drink was an awful tasting cold tea. When asked if we could have water, we were told no. Got our room key around 3pm after waiting from 9am and then didn't get the cases until 3.55. Shower not working and fixed the next day only to find it not working properly two days later. Given some fruit as compensation. Staff very friendly

I stayed at this hotel for three nights in July and I have to admit that I went in to the hotel with really low expectations. Perhaps that is why I was very impressed and blow away! The first thing that you notice, besides the pleasant and calm lobby, is the welcoming service. Throughout my stay, I had the most wonderful service from everybody, from the front desk staff to the restaurant staff to the concierge. The only issue with the service was the overwhelming rush during breakfast, and consequently there were delays with coffee orders and the like - but nothing too significant. I had read most of the reviews of the hotel on Google Maps before traveling so the first thing I did upon getting to the room was to check the air conditioning - and it worked fine! I noticed that there was some water dripping from the A/C but not a significant amount by any stretch of the imagination - just a few drops and nothing that bothered me. The only issue I felt with the A/C was the position relative to the bed - the A/C blows perpendicular to the bed and so it gets a bit warm on the left edge of the bed. Management may want to consider changing the layout of the rooms to make sure the A/C blows towards the bed. The rooms are spacious and while the furniture is a bit old it is clean and comfortable. The bathroom is unbelievably spacious - the fittings are modern and work well. I sadly didn‚Äôt even use the third of the bathroom that contains the tub. The food and drinks at the hotel were, to my surprise, extremely good. Whether it was the buffet for breakfast or the lunch at the downstairs cafe, the food was cooked well and very tasty. Prices are also reasonable and portions are large. I didn‚Äôt get to experience the pool or the gym on this trip as I was there for a conference, but the Merusaka was a great stay, and one I would recommend.

Our family of 4 stayed here for 7 nights in an interconnected room (2 rooms). The rooms were spacious and well designed though it could do with a minor cosmetic uplift. Service was always attentive and friendly. The hotel has 3 restaurants onsite and provided enough food and drinks variety for a long stay. The hotel is kid friendly (excellent diving board for both kids and adults). For the shopaholics, Bali Collection shopping centre is in close walking proximity. We will be back if we manage to secure a similar deal again.
Pelayanan kurang bagus staf gk bersahabat.. Driver menunggu dan tamunya ternyata di kasih transportasi gratis sama hotel kenapa begitu gak kasian sama yang punya tamu..??

BARELY 3 STAR CAUCASIAN RESORT . Definitely Not 5 star. We stayed for 7 nights. Spent NYE here. 27dec -3Jan. Negative - Whole resort looks very tired & not well maintained - Ice cream station at beach bar not friendly and whole area super filthy and used ice cream sticks all over and creating even more ants - Beach bar filled with flies all over the drinks preparation area - Kitchen team not able to manage crowd. Food and drinks can wait up till 30mins in peak timing - Room Shower head & basin tap needs changing - No sound proof for the rooms, can hear loud and clear on what‚Äôs happening outside - Breakfast buffet is not good - too many kids & family around. Not very relaxing + not very mature resort. Positive - Spacious bathroom, clean pool - Nice beach - Wifi easily connected around whole resort even at beach area, very stable and smooth - Aircon nice and cool in rooms - Bed very large & comfortable mattress - Water heater heats up quick, nice and hot - Housekeeping is good - 3 restaurants food is decent at least - Staff friendly - Bali Collection is lovely mall - gym is nice and spacious In conclusion, just whole resort super tired. Don‚Äôt believe the pictures you see. I definitely won‚Äôt be returning. Coming from Singapore, only 2 hours plane to here, I come Bali ALOT! And this is by far, most disappointing resort :( oh well. To Singaporeans reading this review, hope you can consider other resort.

Recently stayed having never stayed here before. Absolutely brilliant. The staff were so incredibly friendly and fun to be around. Nothing was ever a problem or too hard. My family absolutely loved it - the food and choices were excellent, the different pools were fun to use and really happy with our rooms (had inter connecting). Definitely coming back to stay again!
Beautiful, spacious hotel! Great family holiday.

Kamar seperti bau lembab, check in di jam 4 sore saja masih belum dapat kamar, setelah marah2 baru diberikan kamar. Tapi giliran mau late check out tidak dikasih. Setiap telepon ke Guest Service susahnya minta ampun‚Ä¶ Mau proses check out minta bawa barang, harus antri. Telepon guest service sudah sudah dan butuh waktu, minta bawa barang harus antri lama dulu‚Ä¶ Ampun deh buang waktu sia2‚Ä¶. Sangat mengecewakan‚Ä¶. Beda dengan hotel bintang 5 lainnya.

We had a memorable holiday at Merusaka Nusa Dua last week. Excellent service, courteous staff, well maintained property and above all loved the food in all the restaurants. The breakfast spread was amazing - multi cultural cuisine, top quality..we were spoilt for choices. The house keeping and room services were prompt and the private pool attached to our rooms were like a cherry on the cake. Our family of four had a memorable stay and hopefully will be here for our next visit to Bali. Keep up the good work, team Merusaka.
The staff were amazing beautiful setting beautiful pool areas overall a great stay would highly recommend

Pros * Beautiful hotel and clean * A few different restaurants to try with vegetarian options. * All-inclusive breakfast caters to many people. Has bakery items, cheese, meat, sushi, ramen, Indian food like roti and masala, yogurt, fruit, multiple egg options, and more! It‚Äôs also very delicious * The staff have been very attentive and kind * Don‚Äôt have to pay to use beach chairs * Sand is soft and clean * Multiple pools to choose from * One pool has a swim-up bar * The resort is accessible for those that may be in a wheel chair as there are ramps to choose instead of stairs. * Free bottles of water in the room but nothing else. * TVs have Netflix loaded on them if you feel you want to watch tv * Umbrellas are available for use in the lobby if you need * It has AC * Has a safe * Rooms are spacious Cons * If you are on the beach, drinks are not offered to you, however you can go up to the bar and bring them over but most people didn‚Äôt * There was construction happening so unfortunately when you were by the pool it took away from the relaxation * The rooms are noisy!! This was the biggest downfall for me. We had a neighbour on one side blasting Justin Bieber and the other had children who would scream every night. Not relaxing in that aspect. * You can‚Äôt control the temperature in the room. It‚Äôs set to 21 and we tried turning it down for sleeping and it didn‚Äôt do a thing. One night we woke up and our room was 26 degrees. * The food at breakfast isn‚Äôt properly labelled in terms of what ingredients it contains. For example, it would say ‚Äúmixed sushi‚Äù or ‚Äúmixed sandwhiches‚Äù and there was no indication if something contained, meat, fish, etc. Turn up volume to listen to video. It is while we are trying to relax in our room and can hear kids next door
Merusaka is always the best option when I have holidays in Bali. Especially, yuliarta gives us high level service. Thank you very much.

Menginap di Merusaka sangat ok. Lokasi langsung di tepi pantai dengan pasir putih yang bersih dan pemandangan yang sangat ok. Kamarnya nyaman, staf ramah, dan fasilitas lengkap. Cocok banget untuk liburan santai. Highly recommended!

Really nice hotel. Excellent service, multiple pools and a clean and calm beach front. Good value in terms of price . There are 3 restaurants , beachside bar and a shuttle bus to the nearby Bali collection for more restaurants and shopping. There is also a kids pool . Easy to get food and drinks served by the bar . Would also recommend a lagoon room with your own pool shared with 3 other rooms (you rarely see anyone else in there)

Everything was perfect! We have stayed 1 week in Deluxe Room with breakfast included option. Hotel was very quite, silence to rest. Breakfast had too many variety to choose and it was not the same every day. Private beach and pools were amazing. Staff was very kind and helpful. Only 2 points to add as improvement points; GYM should be bigger since it is not possible to work out more than 2 person at the same time. Second wifi speed and access range in outdoor area could be better.

We stayed at Merusaka in their private pool villa for 4 days. The stay was amazing overall. The villa room had quite a big pool in itself and opened into a very very long common pool which was shared only by a very few people. The private beach at the hotel was beautiful with calm and swimmable waters. The staff was very polite and helpful and kept sending us goodies all along. Overall a very luxurious experience and worth the money.

1. Staff poorly trained. When you ask for something they always forget and you need to ask for it over and over. 2. Extremely low quality food at the buffet, and food was never replenished when finished and each morning I had to follow 2-3 times with different staff members and wait for 30 minutes before it was replenished. 3. Poor maintenance. Some areas of the Hotel are poorly maintained, for a 5 star hotel.

Great experience. The resort is located by the beachfront and aims to bring an experience where you don‚Äôt have to worry about anything. Ours was a little bit different however. We first got assigned the 2109 room with King-size bed and pool next to the room. The room in itself was gorgeous with great amenities, comfy bed and spacious room. However the biggest setback was the soundproofing that was VERY bad. The fact that we had noisy neighbours obviously did not help but even small conversations in the hallway were very noisy because of the bad sound insulation. We had a rough first night Fortunately, when the guest relations department was made aware of our experience, they did everything they could to better our stay. They changed our room to what seems like a renovated one and apologized for this experience. Since then, our stay has been wonderful. The breakfast provides a lot of options, from pancakes, waffles to American-style, Indonesian-style etc‚Ä¶ The various restaurants are also great, the pools are very big, beautiful and calm and the whole resort is overlooking the private beach on which you can just sit back and relax. The best of the Merusaka experience is definitely the Service that will do everything to provide you with the best experience possible. All in all I would recommend staying at Merusaka Nusa Dua if you get the chance, but to be very wary of the sound proofing of the room you‚Äôll get.

Rooms are excellent and beds are very comfortable. Pool is great and you can use it 24/7. Food is mid - but you can pick something that is good to eat. Breakfast which is included in stay is great by the way (variety of food). Cons - nothing works after 11:30AM.

Servis terutama pada saat check in, bisa menghabiskan waktu 10-20menit. Apalagi pas paket nyepi, antri check in nya parah. Selain itu, kalau mau pesan gofood, driver gofood tidak diperbolehkan anter ke concierge. Tapi di satpam juga tidak bisa dititip. Repot kalau mau pesan gofood.

Caution! We never got our deposit back. They told us the deposit would be automatically credited to our credit card in two weeks. But the money never arrived... even after repeated inquiries. Unfortunately we were there on our honeymoon.

The beach was so dirty that it was not suitable for any water activities. The swimming pool was super hot and not comfortable to stay in. Restaurant: Even though we had booked all-inclusive, there were many things that were charged extra. The surcharge was about 5 to 10 euros, which is not an issue, but the food was really poor quality and we had many stomach problems. There are no night activities if you are young. You have nothing to do there after 23:00. Everything is closing and you cannot even have a drink. In general, there is bad hygiene, poor quality food, and it is absolutely boring. This was my worst vacation so far. I even ended it before the planned time.

Beautiful setting with easy access to pools and the crystal blue beach. Staff are lovely, rooms are perfect. Breakfast buffet is amazing with plenty of choices to suit a variety of palettes. Made to order omelettes and banana pancakes. Perfect location for families, singles, couples and friends. A choice to relax on your own deck and your own pool or by one of the other pools or our own beach in front of the hotel. It's also away from the hustle and bustle of the busy part of Bali but only a short taxi ride into town. I would definitely go back and recommend this to everyone.

Merusaka Nusa Dua was one of my best accommodation experiences in Bali. With its unique texture, quality service and unforgettable memories, this hotel is definitely a place I would like to come back to! Thanks to the entire team - you are amazing! ÔøΩüå∫‚ú® See you again soon!*

Semuanya berjalan lancar , memuaskan serta membahagiakan..Yg mengecewakan adalah saat breakfast kami semua tamu hotel harus mengantri lebih dari 10 antrian, padahal saat itu sedang hujan. Tamu2 hotel ini 70% lebih adalah WNA turis yg berlibur..malu bgt sebagai WNI melihat antrian ini, Pdahal ini hotel top off the line BUMN Indonesia. Kami mengantri seperti antrian sembako murah. Padahal rate hotel di saat itu 2 jt ke atas
Perfect. Udah 2 kali stay di merusaka dan bakal balik lagi. Lokasinya strategis terasa private nya, Pelayanan sangat ramah dan helpfully mulai dari check in sampai check out, kamar nya nyamaann !!!

Rooms were amazing! Loved the pools by our bedside and walking to multiple pools around the resort not to mention the beach by the pools! Location- 40 minutes from all tourist destinations. Service is amazing- they speak so well to us and treat us like family! We wanted to make a special thank you to the pool bar staff for always making our day.

We booked as an all inclusive deal on Luxury Escapes and went in with realistic expectations - we loved our stay! Yes some parts were a little dated and the room wasn't spotless but our aircon worked fine, shower was decent and the bed was huge and very comfortable. Restaurants were great, staff were very attentive and really helpful with providing vegan options. Pools were a highlight, very clean and not too busy despite the hotel being fully booked. You have to get in early if you want a sun lounger around the pool though. All interactions were easy and pretty seamless. Staff were quick to provide extra bottles of water when we called reception. Taxi service was good. Beach was very clean and well maintained. We would definitely stay again.

This is one of the worst service i have ever gotten in my entire life!!! And yes, i have stayed at 3 or even 2 hotels before. Employee are soo unprofessional i had a hard time believing that they work in hospitality: 1. unable to meet the checkin timeline. They just told me to seat and wait til they contact on WhatsApp. But after 1 and a half hours, which I believe is plenty of times to prepare the room, there is still nothing. The checkin time has already past half an hour ago, but the only answer i got when i go to ask was wait?!! This is not how a 5 star hotel should treat customer. I HAS NOT RECEIVED ANY APOLOGY OR EXPLANATION for this!!! 2. When I ask for way to travel outside (since this is a big hotel and it is probably more than 1km from our stay), the receptionist just glared at me and said you can book taxi?! Like is that even allowed? Is that how you treat your customer? I only asked because i saw the electric car, hoping that they will give me explanation on how to use or order it!! 3. After i confront them about the stay, they gave me the key to the room and tell me to wait for someone to escort me to the room and well, it has been another 15mins since, who would have guessed that, right? 4. And the reason why i let it all out on this review, was because we are not the only ones, there are other people have to wait in the lobby like us as well after AN HOUR past the checkin time! I really hope to never come across this kind of hotel again, not only it pisses me off, but it made me feels like wasting my money on ‚Äú5-star‚Äù treatment.

- hotelnya sangat luas. - buggy car 24jam responsif - staf hotel sangat helpfull - kamar luas, lengkap dengan sofa dan balkon, - kamar mandi sangat luas üòÜ - untuk rasa makanan, agak kurang menurut saya - kolam renang luas dan banyak - view nya bagus banget - pantai bersih dan bagus - hotel sangat terawat saran : - untuk kolam anak bisa ditambah dengan perosotan kecil /mainan biar lebih seru - playground indoor kurang menarik untuk hotel sekelas merusaka. juga bisa dibuatkan outdoor playground seperti di hotel lainnya. dan ada 1 lagi yang kurang menurutku, padahal PENTING dan bisa banget jadi daya tarik. jadi, kami menginap 2 malam disini, awal september. saat check in, kami dapat voucher free foto keluarga dengan fotografer. malam itu juga saya langsung hubungi kontak yang tertera, slow respon. dan baru dibalas besok siang harinya. kami janjian dan ternyata jadwalnya full. paling cepat baru bisa 2-3 hari lagi katanya. dan harus mengambil hasil soft file sendiri ke office nya yang entah dimana saya lupa ( what ??? ) hehe.. harusnya bisa ada opsi dengan fotografer lainnya. hotel besar, jadi ketika tamu hotel sedang ramai, tamu tetap bisa dapet benefitnya. next time semoga bisa dipermudahlah..

I don't have enough good things to say about this place. Located in the beautiful Nusa Dua area, this amazing resort has a great private beach with lots of chairs and umbrellas, so many pools(!), restaurants that offer many cuisines, polite and friendly staff and great hospitality. Many rooms have direct pool access, it is kid friendly and they have great breakfast options. They had a fun pool party on Sunday which we enjoyed. The Nusa Dua area has good water sports and is close to Bali Collection. However, depending on the things you want to enjoy in Bali, take a look at the distances. I highly recommend this place to make your vacation perfect.

We stayed here for a night and enjoyed our stay. Despite the furnishings being a little dated and some issues with air-conditioning, the room was large and comfortable. The bathroom was equipped with both shower and large bathtub. Check in and out were fast with no issues. The nearest shops are at Bali Collection and there is an hourly free shuttle. The breakfast restaurant has many varieties of local food and all the staff were very pleasant. The are several swimming pools but the best part is the clean and private beach that is part of the hotel. It was windy and relaxing at the beach.

The hotel itself is undeniably nice, and the beach area is well-maintained. I liked the room ambience a lot, especially the bathroom. One notable drawback was the distance between the ballroom and the rooms. I found it rather inconvenient, especially when attending events or functions although the hotel did provide buggy car service to bridge this gap, it was a a thoughtful touch. The menu boasted a diverse range of choices, however the dishes were somewhat lackluster, and while they weren't outright unpleasant, they didn't leave a lasting impression.

Nginep sini waktu Nyepi 2023. Overall fasilitas dan keamanan hotel oke, tapi, mungkin kudu dibenahi sistem dan flow nya ketika okupansi sangat tinggi. Jadi ketila proses check in ataupun check out tidak terjadi antrian yg sangat mengular. Begitu juga untuk resto saat breakfast dan dinner, untuk bisa diperhatikan lagi kebersihan dan kerapihan makanannya. Jujur rada kaget waktu breakfast kondisi nya se chaos itu, jadi experience nya kayak lagi ngantri makanan di kondangan. Food stall banyak yg telat refill, alat makan telat juga. Sayang aja semua sudah bagus dan enak tp ada experience yg kurang greget.

Great experience staying at this massive property just before Christmas. Service is very welcoming and good to stay with kids. Buffet offers a wide variety of cuisines. The room AC was not very effective, the sink has some issues with water standing in it and the fan did not work properly. The tour and travel offers decent packages but it's expensive that what is being offered outside through other agents so double check before you book. Right on the beach with clean waters and couple of big pools with public access.

This hotel is so far away from 5 stars. Facilities are so old and not clean ,service is bad. Breakfast is terrible : mostly Indonesian food but not even good quality,no chicken at all. I wouldn‚Äôt suggest to stay here to anyone for the price they‚Äôre offering. I‚Äôm so disappointed. I‚Äôve booked 2 nights and after I came immediately ask to cancel the second night but they refused. They made me stay in this place which is also weird and sad. Will never come back

This place is INCREDIBLE!!!! I have been to Bali 5 times and this is by far the best place I have stayed. The beach is clean and private, the pools are amazing, the food is excellent and so many options, the spa is great and the staff are so friendly and amazing. We are staying in a villa and having our own private pool that can be opened up to an even larger one, all a short walk to a perfect white beach is truly incredible. I am surprised by some of the other reviews. Who cares if the sun lounger isn‚Äôt brand new when you have pools and a pristine beach all at your fingertips at a very reasonable price? Priorities! Will definitely be back to Merusaka.
Beautiful place, you can stay for a whole week, relaxing, swimming and joining their activities
Best hotel with so many activities My room view is in ocean Nice place Good for kids and family

This is one of the best hotel i ever been and i guess the one of the best hotel in bali nusa dua too.. specially the room we have ohh my gosh i love it worth the price ! It was a amazing very cozy room like a home very spacious.. and not only that it comes with free breakfast, a late coffee and tea, a 1 &half hour free unlimited cocktails and 2pcs each free laundry whats else lots of swimming pool and front of the beach what else i could ask or say about this place it was simply amazing.. and shout out with all the great people/staff very friendly, very helpful and very attentive.. iam very happy to come back to this place again and again.. Note theres some renovations the day we visited but it didnt bothers us .. Overall our stay is fantastic and wonderful..

We had a great 5 night stay at Merusaka. We were a group of 10 people and they took great care of us. The staff were the absolute best and very friendly. We did the all inclusive route which was great. Lots of selection and fast service. We enjoyed a massage at the spa which was fabulous. The grounds are beautiful. We did a family photoshoot with the professional photographer. It was such a fun experience and our photos turned out beautiful. They even edited any people from the background for us. We swam in both pools and the ocean as well. There is a free shuttle that takes you to Bali Collection for shopping, nail salons, and restaurant options. Overall, we had a lovely family trip at this resort! Suksma üå∫ü§ç

Surprised with the positive reviews!!! The property looks way different in actual..in pictures it looks very attractive and clean and actually its very dirty. We experienced mosquitoes in the room as soon as we entered in the room, lobby had weird smell, toilets near reception(broken and out of paper smells like public toilets), bar, beach area very bad in cleanliness, no vibes at all. We checked out in 10 minutes after checked in.

Nyepi disini mantap. Kalau malam sblm nyepi bisa jalan dikit liat pawai dan pertunjukan ogoh ogoh. Cuma seblm nyepi lebih baik makan dulu susah cari makan. Hotelnya mantap besar sehari bisa jalan di hotel aja 12rb langkah

Had a enjoyable stay at Merusaka with my family. Our room is big enough with shared pool with other 4 rooms in a row. The one I like the most is they have their own private beach that is clean and not as crowded. The only downside was during breakfast time on the 23 Dec 2023. The staff insisted that I need to pay for extra breakfast for my kid cos she is 7 yo. Even I‚Äôve told her I‚Äôve paid for everything she was insisting with that until she finally checked the system. I wish she can check it first before passing that comment as if we sneaked in to breakfast area without aware of that. I understand that the breakfast area was quite packed and full but for a five-star hotel, I expect a more decent hospitality.

Book Deluxe with Pool access, the room wasn‚Äôt ready even i arrived at 3pm and when i booked the room i was asking for king bed but they put us into twin bed that they merged it become 1 big bed and it feels uncomfortable. The breakfast restaurant is insane, so many crazy Russian who go into breakfast restaurant with bikini and that‚Äôs allowed meanwhile i didn‚Äôt see something like that in other 5stars hotel/resort because usually there‚Äôs rules for that. The direct pool from our room also so small, totally different from online picture.
Sempurna. One stop hotel dengan kualitas yang worth the price, above malah. Berharap one day saya bisa kembali lagi.

Hotel yang nyaman: kamar lega dan nyaman (bahkan beberapa kamar tersedia kolam renang kecil private); makanan lumayan beragam dan cukup enak; pemandangan ke arah laut dan ambiencenya juga sangat OK; parkir juga tersedia cukup plenty. Memang saking grande dan leganya hotel ini, jarak jalan kaki ke lobby atau sekadar ingin makan pagi jadi cukup lumayan. Apalagi tatkala hujan, tidak semua akses pedestriannya rain-free, serta ada beberapa bagian jalan yang tidak rata/drainase tidak lancar sehingga agak menggenang dan sulit dilewati tatkala hujan.

We stayed here for 6 nights and we absolutely loved this hotel. The room we had was lovely (my son loved the bath), all the staff were very nice and facilities were great. The pools are amazing!! If you want the chilled and relaxed pool, you can go to the tiered infinity ones. But if you want the lively atmosphere one, you can go to the one by the beach ! (Also they have foam party in this pool every sunday. So much fun!) And they also have 2 kiddies pools. We enjoyed the kids club too! Ms Rai, Ms Putri and Ms Nanik were amazing. We went to the kids club nearly everyday when we stayed there and my son looooved it. Food were beautiful. They have 3 restaurants and we had dinner in every one of them. All amazing. Breakfast time was the busiest time as this hotel is huuge. But breakfast was superb. Lots of selection. The hotel is very exclusive as its in ITDC complex. The beach is lovely and clean. The only downside is the wifi was a little bit poor though and i wish they have outdoor playground for the kids. Overall we enjoyed our stay here and we‚Äôll be back !

Thanks for leaving us without airconditioning for 4/5 nights. We reported air-conditioning not working on the second day we arrived, 2 technician came pressed a few buttons, airconditioning still not working. Being away most of the day from the hotel and coming back late night, we were only able to check if airconditioning was working at night, but of course, too late to change room..so we ended up not having proper airconditioning for 4 nights out of 5....Finally, on the last night they placed a portable airconditioning

First time I saw such a poorly arranged service. Location and facilities are reasonably good, but we always struggled with service. Bright examples: new years eve and half the wine list is not available. Is new year dinner you promote should rely on old stock, or you should stock up? Leaking AC. They came to fix it 3 times and leaked next day again. Do you like to sleep with dripping water? Come here. In the positive side: Great pool jumping deck. Fantastic new year open air party, nice and cozy pool bar.
amazing friendly staff, they were happy to welcome you whenever they saw you. nothing was too much trouble.
Nice, clean and beautiful view! Warm and friendly staff! Delicious food!!

Made Yuliarta Team FO (Oni, Ami) Team banquet (Anom, Suta, Desak) Terima kasih kepada semua team MERUSAKA dari Housekeeping, Security, Front Office, Banquet, Chefs yang sudah dengan sangat baik memberikan pelayanan kepada group kami sehingga semua acara berjalan dengan lancar. Suasana hotel bagus, makanan nya enak, staff ramah¬≤. Semoga kita bisa bekerjasama kembali dikemudian hari.

The location is fantastic. The hotel has its own private beach. Lovely swimming pools. The room comes with 4 water bottles, complementary each ,about 300 ml. It's hard to get more from housekeeping. The food is ok. If you travel with young kids, it's advisable to book breakfast in your booking, else explore the cafes at Bali Collection.

We really enjoyed our short stay at Merusuka, perfect location & amenities, right on the beach, plenty of pools, fantastic service, thank you to Reni in the buffet, she went above and beyond to ensure that we were happy... Would definitely come back again.. Highly recommend üòÉ

We definitely had a fantastic 4-day stay at this splurge beachfront hotel. Very family-friendly. The staffs were all helpful. Great selections of food at breakfast. The beach was otherworldly enchanting. I'd suggest everyone who wishes to have a fulfilling and pleasant leisure time in Bali to stay at Merusaka. It should be everyone's go-to place if he wishes to avoid the hustle and bustle of Kuta and its adjacent areas. Would love to come back here on our upcoming Bali trip in the near future. ‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®‚ú®

Rooms have very dim lighting which makes it difficult to look for things as you need to use a phone light for backup. I‚Äôm very unhappy with the communication from the staff at the main lobby. At no time do they elaborate on activities/passes/allowances upon check in. You are handed your key etc and sent away. For eg, free photo shoot - you are not advised to book when you check in. Another eg, you order a taxi, the concierge quote a price, and then the drive argues about entry fees. And dare you ask for a glass of water with ice‚Ä¶you need to pay for a barely chilled bottle of water. Would I personally recommend staying here? As a resort it is impeccably beautiful however front desk staff need further hospitality education.

Our roundtrip through Java and Bali ended at the beautiful Merusaka Hotel. Finally we had the chance to relax and to enjoy staying at one single place. Today I am glad we have chosen this premium hotel in Nusa Dua. The check in procedure happened flawlessly with professional staff that knew how to treat customers in a very welcoming way. From the first moment onwards the hotel offered us its beautiful and large pools. Once in our spacious rooms we were extremely happy to be able to take a relaxing shower. The rooms were equipped with the most important amenities such as a safe, a fridge and a flawlessly working aircon. The bathrooms had not only a shower but also a stand-alone bathtub. The surroundings of the rooms are well maintained and covered with greenery. The ground floor rooms had a private pool, too. The hotel offers several restaurants with large menu selections. The beach is accessible directly from the hotel garden and food / beverages can be ordered to the long chairs by the beach. What we loved is the staff's professional work attitude. Very polite, smiling and helpful at all times and fast serving. The food in any restaurant was delicious and beyond. If you want to take a timeout you can book your holidays at this hotel with no hesitation. You won't regret it. If I have to criticise something it's only room doors which slam and make a huge noise if you do not hold the door to close. I think this could be solved easily by a handyman. Anything else was perfect! Thank you Merusaka for having us and giving us the chance to rejuvenate for one week. And a very big thanks to the staff! You definitely make a difference! Terima Kasih!

Not five star but very attentive and friendly staff, very relaxing atmosphere, enjoyable beach front and a comfortable basic room with plenty of space. Would recommend to somebody looking to stay in Nusa Dua.

Lokasi the best sih ini Merusaka. Akses pantai dari hotel tinggal ngesot nyampe.. cuma kamar cukup old, breakfast sangat standard. View dari balkon kamar saya malah banyak sampah. Overall cukup puas dengan lokasi dan pantai nya. Tapi kalau kamar sih tidak sama sekali.
Krisna took us for walk around Nusa Dua. He was very nice friendly young man. Could help working on his English, very much enjoyed his company. Looking forward to another walk with him.

A very good resort with private beach access. Comfortable stay. Only issue with service is that it is too slow. Asked for a couple of items and it took about an hour to be delivered. Hotel provides complimentary photo session which was a really bad experience, as we stayed for a few days and post getting to know about the same when we contacted the person, all slots during our stay were booked. This kind of reflected bad and was not a good experience for us.

A huge hotel with rooms for 800 guests right on the beach, the hotel has a bit of a charter atmosphere about it. The hotel has huge free areas for walking and creates a pleasant atmosphere that we liked. The breakfast has a lot of variety, but for us it feels too messy when 100s of guests have to go all in.. if you choose a villa or a suite, you get your own area for breakfast with different content and slightly better service, but above all calm and quiet. There are nice pools with different surfaces depending on whether you want to be private or not. What we don't like is the morning race to reserve a sunbed with a towel, gives an inharmonious atmosphere, if only the guests had the sense to remove the towels when you left for the day, it would give an automatic seat rotation. The beach promenade is very nice. We liked the the walking distance to Bali Collection, a small center with shopping and restaurants. What a terrible check in experience, after a 30h journey.. all you want is to get to the room and sleep.. our experience took 30 minutes.. papers to be sorted, printed, signed in wads if seemed a very cumbersome process : Can't you just prepare all the papers or take the passport and do the administration the next day? We also had a room change planned, which did not go well. Very little coordination between the staff and unclear and conflicting instructions to us. But overall we are satisfied.

Cozy hotel with access to beach and semi-private swimming pool just at the back of each room. However, the property needs upgrading, bathroom lights need to be brighter, amenities needs to be checked to make sure sufficient supplies for each night. I enjoyed the bike rental but haven't had the chance to enjoy the other facilities such as table tennis and beach voll dined in one of the three dining places, Gading Restaurant. The food is delicious and the service is above expectation. Overall, it was a pleasant stay.
The location and hotel is beautiful The staff are so helpful and professional and thank you to all the staff for making my stay so pleasant

Overall a very good hotel located in one of the best beaches in Bali. It‚Äôs attached to the Nusa Dua beach at one of the best locations. Depending on the time you go the sea could be very calm and shallow or even quite rough. Great place to chill and take a dip. Fairly good for surfing as well. The hotel itself is old but refurbished and looks quite new. Rooms are quite large with good quality amenities. The view from the rooms are just other rooms - not so great. The reason I rate the rooms and the hotel less than 5 star is because there was construction happening during our stay and it was very noisy. Not acceptable to have this during a holiday. It started quite early in the day and went on for the most part. Food at the main restaurant was mostly mediocre. Spread for breakfast was quite food with a number of options. Didn‚Äôt find anything super great. The bar at the beach and the Ja‚Äôjar restaurant were pretty good. They both had good menus and the food was quite delicious. We had number of meals there. The staff are super friendly, kind and helpful. This is one of the good things about this place and in general Bali. They are pretty quick to respond to requests and cheerful all the time. Good vibes to be around. All in all I would come here again but I would check about the construction as this complain has been there before as well.

The resort is amazing but the duty manager on the reception can't handle big group and he was stress and didn't welcome us properly. Shower was broken but the maintenance team came to fix it Rooms were without iron Food was extremely delicious and the restaurant team were friendly helpful and welcoming I loved them the deserve 5/5

Hotelnya bagus bnget,akses nya juga mudah. staff nya juga ramah tamah..ada bogie yg antar ke kita lokasi kamar,kamarnya pun bersih bnget dan ada bathtub juga..untuk makanan ya rsanya lumayan enak..terima kasih merusaka üôè

Beautiful resort. However, the downside to the resort is the rubbish on the beach. It‚Äôll be nice if they cleaned it up. Anyways, the buffet breakfast is always delicious and fresh pastries every morning. We had some miscommunication with the reception where our laundry was misplaced but they quickly rectified it when my husband demand a refund if they didn‚Äôt find our laundry. Other than this, it was a very relaxing stay.

The smell of humidity in the rooms are horrible. We ask to change our room and they put us in another one that was worse. There were even holes in the sheets and mushrooms on the walls. We will never come back here. This hotel is an industry that doesn‚Äôt car about the well-being of customers. The food at the breakfast is not good quality. It is not a 5*‚Ä¶

The ‚ÄúMerusaka‚Äù resort and location in Nusa Dua is AMAZING! ALL the staff are friendly, extremely professional, and cannot be faulted, and go above and beyond to ensure that you have the best possible stay! Thank you! We will definitely be back!

Although Merusaka appears to be a beautiful Hotel it was far from the experience we had. Day 1 Husband was sick with food poisoning, the second day I was sick with food poisoning. This knocked us out for the 3nights we stayed and we barely left our room. Had to get a doctor in twice because of how sick we were. Because of this the last 3 days of our vacation was spent in bed or over a toilet. Add it to Hotels Response - love that you take no responsibility in your reply. It was most definitely the food we ate at the hotel as we only ate and drank from your hotel. Yes it can take up to 8hrs to show symptoms but can also show with a few hours. Even if it was 8hrs still had been eating at the hotel. Dr was pretty certain it was also from the food we ate here.
Hotel dg akses ke pantai yg bisa dibuat main dg anak karena ombaknya yg tidak terlalu besar. Kamar luas dilengkapi dg bathtub dan bubble soap.. hotel staff ramah. Sangat cocok untuk staycation.

The service is excellent. The rooms are dated although big and comfortable need a refurbishment to keep within the 5 star standards. The gym is terrible only one person can train in the weights area I would give it a 1 star. If you need a gym to train in do not stay here you will be disappointed. Also it was pouring with rain and they would not open prior to 6.00am when I asked the Desk clerk who said he was the manager he told me access was on a timer. Pools are great. I have stayed in Bali 8 times this is the least favourite. The only exceptions being fantastic service Food is reasonable and the Pools are excellent.

the resort is big with spacious room ,located in a very nice area, nice pool, good staff, but the bathroom is really poorly designed, the shower head doesnt work very well, the sink tap ended being broken. i think if you pay within 150 per night it is a good deal otherwise too expensive for what it is .
Gorgeous hotel, top notch breakfast buffet, very friendly staff and access to one of the most amazing beaches in the world. It made me fall in love with Bali!

Design tempatnya bagusss Lobbynya dengan atap yg unik Design kolamnya yg luas dan bertumpuk¬≤ Taman yg luass Bagusss Sy ambil kamar Deluxe Kamarnya besar. Ada balkon, ada bath tub, hair dryer. Bisa rental sepeda, sy cuma inget 1jam 45rb, 2jam 80rb, bisa hall day dll Ada activity juga tapi ga gitu banyak Kemaren 30 Juni, Hari Minggu lagi ada Foam Party. Jd anak sy seneng banget. Trus ada tempat loncat di kolam juga, anak sy coba dan dia senang. Ada pantai langsung Bisa main pasir / air laut Lucu malam ada yg Nari di gang Tower kamar Ada stand souvenir juga Kalau mau belanja... Besoknya pagi juga ada lagi Jualnya kain pantai, topi, tas rotan, lukis dll Breakfastnya lumayan byk pilihan Penuh banget tapi servicenya oke professional, makanan piring direfill dengan baik Breakfast ada mesin kopi, jus, jamu Egg station, pouch egg, half boiled udah tersedia... Ada juga Pork Station : sosis, ham, bacon, salami Sushi, Salad, Fruit Chawan mushi yg enak Mini bapao Sebagian kecil Indian section Bakso? Soto? Pancake, waffle, roti Pudding, Singkong goreng, Ubi, Es campur jelly, Cereal, berbagai jenis Cheese, dll

We booked a great deal on Luxery Escapes months ago and then saw some fairly negative reviews so thought - well you get what you pay for. We have been extremely impressed by everything, the staff have been wonderful, we have our room adjoining and they are the only two rooms for our private pool. Just perfect. The few times we had an issue it was fixed promptly. A special mention of the Sunday Beach BBQ we did , we cannot remember the staff names but their service was so good - not to mention the food - well worth doing if you are there on a Sunday. We downloaded the Bluebird app and found the taxis are very cheap , plus we did a few day trips but we loved the quiet of Nusa Dua to come back to at the end of the day. Highly recommend .

We booked our stay at this property in the month of February. It was our honeymoon stay. This place is serenely beautiful with a private beach. Early morning you can witness a beautiful sunrise from the beach and hear the chirping of birds that is so majestic. I'm giving this property as a 2.5/5, only because of our bad experience with the management. A well maintenance checks should be their primary responsibility before guest's check in. We had to constantly check with the reception desk as AC was not functioning properly. Though the service was quick but of no help. We booked our rooms which was upgraded to the new room but later we were asked to shift to a different room as the AC was not running. It was very hot and disappointing to see that we paid for the stay wondering to make beautiful memories turn out not so good. Later, a complimentary cake was sent by the manager itself as a token of apology. Which was a good gesture.

Very neat and cosy hotel, super polite stuff and amazing location. The hotel was chosen for a military event for 1000 people during our stay, and generally it was very busy with different conferences. The beach is wide and nice, there is enough space for all guests so nobody fights for a spot under the sun. We got a free photoshoot as a gift from the hotel and were able to schedule it last minute. Photos exceeded our expectations!

Our Villa was lovely, as well as our pool and the lagoon adjacent to it! We swam in them each day. People were friendly and especially food service personnel were friendly to us! Service was often slow or nonexistent and some things were very confusing. For example, when we checked in we never got our luggage number or our room key and no explanation as to when we would so we had to hunt those down later. Sometimes we would text a request and a text would come back two hours later. Photo shoot was wonderful! Tea time and happy hour were wonderful and the food service professionals were fabulous. Overall a bit too expensive for what was offered/ provided for our honeymoon package.
Kedua kalinya menginap saat liburan nyepi. Sangat puas dan senang menginap di sini. Kamarnya oke, layanannya bagus banget, pegawainya ramah, lokasi strategis. Makanannya enak2.
Very nice resort. Private pool villa was great. Food was good too with 5 restaurants to choose from. Good location and facilities

Hotel langganan kalau liburan ke Bali bersama keluarga dan hari ini staff hotel sangat responsif disaat anak saya pendarahan, dijemput ke kamar dan diantar ke rumah sakit menggunakan mobil hotel. Terima kasih untuk bantuannya team Merusaka.

Merusaka Nusa Dua is a beachfront resort in a serene, somewhat rural area, about a 10-minute walk from the nearest local eateries. The staff are friendly, though not exceptional, while the breakfast is impressive, offering a wide variety of choices. The rooms show some signs of age but opting for the pool access unit makes a significant difference, providing direct entry to the pool‚Äîa feature particularly enjoyed by children. Overall, Merusaka Nusa Dua offers a pleasant stay for those seeking a peaceful beachfront escape, despite a few minor drawbacks related to location and room condition.

The room is spacious and clean. There are some complementaries missing such as coffee machine and free drinks in fridge, but so far it is all great. Two room keys are provided, one already attached to the room when checking in, so we enter a cooled room. Recently here since 2 years ago, the resort has some improvement, like the amenities is changed to pump one, which i loved due to its bigger content and better quality. The sofa inside the room is also new. The coffee is in form of a bag. What irritates me is the pool employee, it was stated that it is open from 7am to 7pm, yet, on 6pm, vacant pool bed cushions were collected early, umbrella were closed. Hmm, they should've done that when the pool are closed. Starting early on tidying up makes the guest around the pool feel like being evicted, and make the recent coming to pool guest is sitting on non-cushioned bed.
a great getaway, nice clean hotel, away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

A serene retreat best suited for families seeking calm over chaos. If you're young, wild, and restless‚Äîthis isn‚Äôt your playground. It‚Äôs not where memories are made; it‚Äôs where they‚Äôre slowed down. The beach? Effortlessly accessible. One of my personal favorites for a lazy afternoon with toes in the sand and time on your side. It invites you to do absolutely nothing, and that‚Äôs the point. The mega pool is a highlight‚Äîexpansive, shallow in all the right places, perfect for your little ones to splash safely while you sip something cool and watch the world fade. Now, the food. Let‚Äôs just say it won‚Äôt start a fire in your soul. The flavors play it safe, perhaps too safe. But venture out‚ÄîBali‚Äôs real culinary magic lives beyond the hotel gates. And lastly, the service. Warm, attentive, never overbearing. The staff make you feel like you belong, without ever overstaying their welcome. In short: come here to rest, not to rave. It‚Äôs peace with a view.

My wife and I had an incredible 3 night stay here (we wish it could‚Äôve been longer). The staff here were exceptionally kind, generous, and accommodating to us (they always seemed to go above and beyond for everyone). We had their Lilin romantic dinner here and it was a breathtaking experience. The resort is of exceptional quality: they keep the grounds manicured and the room very tidy. The spa was a pleasurable experience, breakfast had many delicious options for everyone to enjoy. We ate at all the restaurants and the food and drinks were always superb. We would highly recommend this resort to others and we hope to come back in the future!

Really enjoyed our stay! The rooms are clean and in a decent shape. Service was kind and what you'd expect in a big hotel of this class. Breakfast buffet offered anything you could wish for with a huge variety. What made our stay perfect was the beach view, pools and above all the pool bar! Only the gym was very outdated and in a poor shape (considering a high class hotel). Also outside the hotel (10 minutes walk) there are some nice shops and great restaurants at a decent price. Would come back anytime!

Beautiful resort! We stayed at the Merusaka for 4 nights on our recent stay in Bali and the resort was lovely! Nice pools, right on the beach which was perfect and the staff were all so friendly - especially Made who made us feel very welcome on our first night, showing us to our room and around the resort. The room was very big and clean, and comfortable bed. Good food selection at buffet breakfast, especially the omelettes - best omelette I have ever had! I would recommend this resort to others!

Of the several hotels we have visited in the Nusa Dua area, this was the first time we had an unpleasant experience. Initially we booked a deluxe room for 3 days 2 nights. Then we asked to upgrade to direct pool access for an additional 1 million/2 nights. However, the rooms is not like 5 star hotel and we couldn't enjoy the room. In front of our pool there was a very noisy reconstruction going on from morning to 18.00 which only stopped at lunch. We also found there were nails scattered at the bottom of the pool. With so many workers, it also made it impossible for me and my daughter to swim because they would see it. Apart from that, breakfast is varied, the main swimming pool is quite pleasant, staff service is quite good

On arriving down at the beach pool for my husband‚Äôs birthday, Fatma, looked after us and explained their system of ordering drinks. She was smiley and very pleasant. We thank her for welcoming us so pleasantly. This started our stay very nicely‚Ä¶

One of the best hotels we‚Äôve stayed in! Highly recommended. The rooms are super spacious and nice. The resort is huge and the beach is beautiful. Worth every penny, definitely our go-to hotel in Bali

Huge, beautiful resort, and very professional and friendly staff. Was actually impressed on the size of the hotel area, and on the size of the rooms. The swimming pool area is very kids friendly as well with a lot of variety for pool depth that suits all age of kids. There's morning and night market stalls selling Balinese trinkets along the walking passage to the rooms, which just add an extra traditional Balinese atmosphere to it. Beach was a bit of a letdown to be honest as it wasn't as clean as we expected, and the lobby area can be a bit of a chaos everytime we're waiting for our pick-ups/ friend given the huge number of traffic that went by there. But it doesn't take away anything from the overall wonderful experience. Will we go back again if given the chance when we're in Nusa Dua area? Definitely yes

The hotel looks nice in the photos, but in reality needs a lot of refurbish: the paint from the building felt down, the room are big, nothing to comment, but needs some renovation, the beach towels are from the previous century and so on. Breakfast has a few option regarding international cuisine, but it is ok for the local food point of view. The gym in fact is nothing else that 2 rooms with 2 treadmill and 2 bicycles, plus some heavy weights. Definitely not a real gym. The area it is very well secured, it is very safe, but somehow the tourist are trapped in this area - Bali Collection is an outside shopping mall nearby, with some restaurants, but with higher prices then regular Bali. The beach is private - good point - and it's nice. People are a bit lazy but in the end the services are decent. Definitely not a 5 stars hotel, rather a 3 to 4 stars experience.

Nice hotel to stay, spacious rooms. Family friendly. Aesthetics Bali standard. You can walk over the beach and connect yourself with other hotels. This whole place feels like a complex of hotel and resorts. It‚Äôs nice if you like walking a lot. You can stay inside the hotel without feeling bored.
Great place to stay. Kids loved the pool and the diving board. Breakfast was great. Surf spots out the front were fun. Wish we stayed longer.
Comfortable hotel and good quality. Unfortunately, when it rains, the streets are somewhat waterlogged. But overall it is very comfortable for a vacation, has its own beach yard and a good view.

If you are travelling with small children, I highly recommend this hotel. I booked the 2 bedroom suites and I have no complaints. The room is exactly as advertised with a convenient access to a pool, perfect for a morning lap or quick splash with the kids. There's a living room area where the kids can play around freely without being cooped up in the bedroom. We have a butler assigned to us, who contacted us after our checkout because we left some personal items and offered to get it delivered. Huge resorts with private beach access and multiplr swimming pools to choose from. Plus point, there's a kids club with friendly staffs and all sorts of activities to entertain the children.

Meruska Resort in Bali is undoubtedly the best, making our honeymoon even more extraordinary than we had envisioned. We extend our heartfelt gratitude to all the dedicated staff members at Meruska, particularly to Yohana, who was incredibly passionate about their culture and have incredible work ethic, ensuring a seamless and enriching experience for us eating everyday at Gading Restaurant.

Absolutely the best! All of the employees will do whatever they can to help you in any possible way. The place it self is absolutely amazing! Super clean, modern, beautiful well decorated. Not to mention the food is so yum, lots of variety. Highly recommend the romantic dinner by the beach. I stayed in the one bedroom villa and WOW! That‚Äôs the best way to describe. I will be definitely coming back. Big thank you for all of the amazing/super friendly employees that made my and my husband‚Äôs honeymoon extra special. üôèüèª‚ò∫Ô∏è
Amazing, relaxing, nothing too much trouble. I was here with my two daughter and one of their friends for a week. Friendly, smiley staff. Can‚Äôt say enough about it.
Definitely the best place we have ever stayed at. I can't fault the service or the location. Everything has been top notch and I definitely recommend it to everyone

Huge resort, wonderful facilities, multiple swimming pools and private beach access, the room was huge, bathroom was huge, I believe we're staying in the cheapest room and they still have a bathtub in that room - huge plus point. However, the room we're staying in looks and feels old which can be understood considering the quiet covid time and they probably just reopened the resort by the time we're staying. The deep cleaning of the room could be done a bit better, it was a little bit dusty on the furniture here and there, but not that bad. Staff were super friendly and all smiles (especially the front desk who checked us in and accommodated our request of having 1 king size bed instead of twin beds put together), very helpful and welcoming. I would recommend getting the room with pool access too.
Deluxe room feels bigger, there is balcony connected to pool. They use boogey cart to get us to the room. Private beach, and even prayer mat in room is cool

Untuk kondisi disekitar hotel bagus. Krn luas sekali dan terhubung dengan pantai. Untuk kondisi kamar perlu diperhatikan, hotel bintang 5, tp kopi yg dikasih nescafe sachet. Kemudian variasi makanan dr hari ke hari untuk breakfast m, kurang variatif, dan kurang macam macamnya. Untuk kelas bintang 5, hotel ini hanya membersihkan kamar sekali. Bahkan ketika lagi perlu keluar dan coba pasang papan tulisan dont disturb, malah cleaning service membersihkan kamarnya.
We had a fantastic stay. Great beach, white sand, good food.. Would book again!
Best beach in the area by far! Hotel is a bit pricey but worth it given the location in the ITDC zone. Lots to do. Good food selection. Service great.

I had an enjoyable stay at Merusaka Nusa Dua, situated in a strategic location within the Nusa Dua ITDC Area, and it's just a short walk to Bali Collection, where numerous restaurants and shops are available. The lobby's view was stunning, and there's direct access to the beach at the back of the hotel. They also have a jogging track. Merusaka Nusa Dua features several on-site restaurants, a gym, and each building has its own pool for ground-level rooms. To reach your room, you either walk or call a buggy, and each building has its own lift. Despite being of the same type, some rooms have different interiors. The rooms are spacious with a sofa, and the adjustable AC keeps it cool. However, achieving a bright room at night can be challenging. The bathroom is also spacious and includes a bathtub. The hotel has two pool areas, with one featuring a diving platform at two heights. The breakfast offers plenty of choices, though the sushi needs improvement, as it was plain, salty, and lacked protein. The gym has decent equipment with sufficient amenities. The meeting room is spacious, and they provide great snacks. While the lunch menu is amazing, the taste falls short. Dinner, priced at IDR750.000/USD50, is considered too expensive. Despite some minor drawbacks, I genuinely enjoyed my stay and would consider returning for both business and vacation purposes.

Family holiday of 8 adults and our Granddaughter 17 months We loved every minute of our stay, the pools a toddler one and also one with a swim up bar where you could order snacks. The beach view and welcoming smiles and attentive service from the staff. Buffet breakfast was amazing. We had booked all inclusive so no thoughts about a hefty bill for food or drinks at the end of our stay. We also had a room with a pool right outside the balcony you could step into anytime, so indulgent : ) loved it. Yes it may be a little outdated but post covid no tourists etc. It was clean and comfortable and we all had the best time.
Kid loves the Jumping pool Great beach inside and away from the traffic jam in bali Been here multiple times, and it's still the same as ever..

Hotel yang menurut saya jauh di bawah standard ‚Äúbintang 5‚Äù 1. Terlihat dari awal saya menyerahkan kunci mobil untuk vallet, saya harus menyerahkan sendiri kunci tersebut di meja concierge di dalam. Petugas di depan lobby hanya menginstruksi saja tidak melayani. Ketika mobil mau saya pakai pun, tim vallet saling melempar tugas (saya tau karna saya mendengarkan mereka berbicara di HT) 2. Dinding kamar lembab, banyak cat mengelupas di kamar saya 1107 3. Kami memesan kamar dengan layanan private pool access, tapi kolam renang tsb airnya kotor, lantai dasar kolam renang pun kotor. Tidak ada filter menyala, otomatis air pun pasti tidak terfilter sama sekali, 2 malam saya menginap, kolam renang sama sekali tidak di maintenance. 4. Malam terakhir sebelum kami check out, saya pergi keluar ber2 dengan istri, anak kami bersama dgn susternya dikamar, kami pesankan makanan lewat gra*, makanannya sampai di hotel, oleh suster kami lobby hotel di telp, jawabannya nanti dikabarin apakah makanannya sudah datang apa belum (sedangkan dari aplikasi kami, makanan tsb sudah sampai diterima oleh lobby), tapi 30 menit tak kunjung di telp ulang oleh lobby, ketika di telp ulang, jawabannya masih sama, di cek dikabarin. Oleh istri saya di telp lobby nya (dari nomor telp biasa karna kami sedang diluar, kami sempat menegur kenapa tidak dikirim2, jawabannya, ada antrian). Sungguh memalukan untuk pelayanan hotel bintang 5 seperti ini. 5. Dll

Disadvantages of this hotel outweigh its advantages. Pros: - Rooms with access to the pool - Both a bathroom and a shower - Good safe in the room - Enough drinking water in the room (but in glass, so it‚Äôs not for taking away to the beach, etc.) - Good cleaning - Regular change of towels and linen - Friendly staff - Delicious food in Homaya restaurant (Indonesian cuisine) and Ja‚ÄôJan bistro (seafood soup highly recommended) - Beautiful territory - 2 big pools - A sufficient number of sunbeds at the beach - 10 minutes walking from Bali Collection Cons: - Difficulty of communication: they answer for too long, and each type of service has its own phone number (I have 5 different contacts in WA, though I asked only for transfer and SPA) - Disgusting breakfasts; poor choice of food, especially European cuisine, fruits, vegetables, pastries‚Ä¶ - Empty mini-bar in the room - The smell of sewage in the bathroom, the water in the shower is standing and does not go away - The lighting in the room and bathroom is terrible - The wardrobe has one door: 1/2 of the cabinet with its content is always in sight, and the light is always on in the closet - Seaweed at the beach is buried in the sand - Untasty food in the restaurant at the beach (Ja‚ÄôJan by the sea) and in the main restaurant (Gading), it corresponds with the Google rating - No imported beer in restaurants, only Bintang - Few sunbeds by the big pool - Very poor lighting in the WC nearby the big pool - Deposit requirement with a credit card (uneasy for Russians)
Beautiful hotel, friendly and helpful staff, gorgeous beach, great food. 10/10
5 star service and stunning location. Stones throw from the best beach in Bali.

The location is great, the beach is nice and the swimming pools are very nice and clean. Breakfast is good with a lot of options. Overall, it was a good experience, but rooms could definitely receive a makeover. Also worth mentioning is the fact that you can hear everything from the floor like: doors slamming, people talking, elevators etc. So if you are a light sleeper you could have a problem.

I stayed at the Merusaka Nusa Dua for 8 nights with my family in March and it was the most exceptional experience! The resort was magical with excellent facilities, the location was great and the service was fantastic. I am coeliac and there were plenty of gluten free options at all of the restaurants onsite. At the buffet breakfast each morning, I would be asked if I had any special requests for the next day such as gluten free waffles, pancakes and bread I also had wonderful gluten free traditional Indonesian meals during my stay. The staff made me feel very looked after and safe. Would not hesitate to recommend and would love to return one day. Thank you Merusaka.

I stayed at this hotel in May for 10 days. Unfortunately, I was not satisfied. Wi-fi was very poor all the time, with frequent interruptions, and it didn‚Äôt matter where - on the hotel premises or in the room itself. To call via WhatsAp I had to use expensive roaming. Breakfast (buffet) was very bad - little choice and very tasteless. The hotel offers a short photo shoot around the property for $10 per photo. As a result, the photos are not even processed. This is already arrogance and rip-off. In addition, during my stay it was my 30th birthday. They didn't even offer me at least a free cocktail. Although they do have the option for everyone to get a free drink at the bar once. I simply did not drink this drink - it was worse than slop. Apart from a good location, this hotel has no advantages. And this is not 5 stars at all, but much worse. I do not advise.

Hotel yang nyaman, kamar luas, bersih. Bisa bersantai di bath up. Fasilitas hotel lengkap, mulai dari Gym, kolam renang dan view laut yang indah. Sarapan nya banyak pilihan dan enak. Pelayanan ramah dan excellent

I love everything in this hotel Amazing rooms Excellent service Only thing i don‚Äôt like they have mentioned they have Indian food available which was available ( only one thing ) as we are vegetarian we didn‚Äôt find any option except Fruits. I went next door hotel & Ayodoya ( Ganesha restaurant) amazing food available for Indians

The place is really nice and has all kinds of facilities. It‚Äôs multilevel pool is one of the best features. Lot of dinning and drinking options s between different restaurant areas. Staff very friendly and all English speaking. Room we had was not bad. But could have been better. We had 3 rooms however one room had AC not working properly & another room had fridge not working properly. Towels, body lotions, body was, shampoo & conditioner were not provided everyday had to ask for it. Similarly tea, sugar & creamer were not enough. Had to ask for more everyday. Overall comfortable stay and good variety of breakfast which caters for all cuisines.

We were unfortunate to have an Indian wedding during our whole stay. They took up many common spaces with loud indian music, which made our stay impossible with a 3month old baby. We wanted to getaway to get some piece and we could not even enter the beach as the wedding was happening. Once reported, they didnt even say sorry and manager on Duty said this is how we conduct business! So bye bye and he took another phone call.

Room wasn‚Äôt ready when we checked in around 3pm. Then was asked to wait for too long to get the luggage ready. The ladder to the swimming pool and shower in the room needed a fix. Not safe. Had to call room service to make up the room on the first day. Wasn‚Äôt as good as expected.
What a wonderful place to holiday. Everything you want to satisfy your needs. I would love to come back.
Second time to stay at Merusaka. Room, service, food, location are top-notch!

Overall, the service here was good. Except the lady‚Äôs attitude when I checked in. She was not very friendly with cold face and not very supportive. I was satisfied with good service with every smile on the faces of staffs in restaurant, beach, electric car, room men. The beach there was clean and not very crowded, suitable for swimming. Though it looked quite deep so look after your kids carefully.

This is our third visit to Merusaka Resort and every time we have loved it. The staff are the most amazing part of the experience- they are so friendly and helpful and happy. We had an awesome deal which worked out as great value for money for this five star resort. The pools and grounds are super clean. The bars and restaurants have a great variety of food. We can‚Äôt wait for our next visit.

Spacious hotel with very kind staff everywhere, just a tiny walk from Bali Collection and shop/restaurant streets. Beach towels without any problems, plenty of sunbeds, lots of shadow if you want. Beach is very dirty in the morning (tons of platic and weed), afternoon with low tide somewhat clears it, along with guys working since morning (they should get some mechine).
Room yang bagus. Pelayanan oke. Almost no complain. Very recommended
Extremely friendly, very pleasant and helpful staff. Nice beach and a selection of pools. I suggest the all in option, food and drinks all day from all restaurants and bars on the property.

They did a great job at rebranding this old state-owned hotel as high-end, and giving it a major facelift. What I loved: smart TV with netflix and youtube, guest services was very responsive to our needs. Since it is an old hotel it had high quality wooden furniture that's been maintained beautifully. But they changed out all the bathroom fittings, AC, and lighting so they're more modern. The hotel is very big with multiple pools and restaurants/lounges, lots of options. Some cons: there's quite a bit of a walk and some stairs from the lobby to the rooms. Unless you get on a buggy, accessibility may be an issue.

I'm here on business. I adore the atmosphere. The room is spacious and spotless. They appear to have just refurnished, but the sink is jammed, so the water cannot flow properly. It also has direct access to Nusa Dua Beach. The hotel is right next to the Hyatt, so I can eat at their restaurant for lunch. The staffs are pleasant, but not particularly accommodating or helpful. Nonetheless, the overall impression is positive.

We stayed in a room with pool access which is very spacious and clean. There could be some improvement in breakfast side by diversifying it more. The hotel beach is very nice, despite the fact that in Bali is a high tide and low tide, in the ocean water from the hotel you can swim the entire day.
Great resort with good service and cheerful lovely staff. Great experience and variety of restaurants.

Nice hotel, food & staff are amazing too. The only downfall is the room. Its quiet depressing and not enjoyable. Need more lighting in the room and bathroom.room need a deep clean and dusting. staff cleaning the room amd bathroom need to have an eye for detail. Furnitures need a good dusting from bed, to wardrobe shelves. The tub is yucky there is a foul smell. I was refraining to let my 2 kids in. Bathroom tiles need a good scrub.

Bagus banget pantainya, ya nusa dua emang secakep itu sih,, pas malemnya ngeliat sinar bulan di laut cakep bangeeet.. termasuk hotel yg paling muda diantara yg lainnya, cuma mgkn kalo ada playground atau waterslidenya di kolam utk anak2 lebih seru lagi
Fantastic place. Staff couldn‚Äôt do enough for you. Good food. Good drink. Great place.

Great resort in Nusa dua, very friendly and helpful staff. Several infinity pools, one of them with pool bar, and different restaurants to choose from (although the service there is a bit slow). Very nice gym as well.

Overall a good five star resort. Good breakfast options. Clean spacious rooms. Great bathtub. One con is that it has VERY LIMITED TV channels. Unacceptable for a five star hotel. Many four stars offer better TV service.

I stayed here for six nights no doubts staff is friendly, breakfast is awesome , rooms are very good neat and clean. Nearest place is water sports, rest of all activities are far. Ubud is about 1:30 to 2 hours away many activities there but nusa dua is more calm and clean. Internet is good and free, hotel is kids friendly

A beachside paradise. The best and usually clean and accessible beach areas on the island. The provided clean towels and showers, great chairs and umbrellas on property and in the sand. Great beach swimming area right on the edge of the property and amazingly clean and luxurious pools. Design is great with many different style rooms to enjoy.
